channel.title: Comments on: Add Report Wizard Layout Style (Standard Company Style)
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Craig
item.dc:creator: Craig
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Are you aware of any location that gives a list of the supported tags that can be used in the StyleTemplates.xml file? eg. I would like to set the text alignment for all of my table headers to the left etc.

Many thanks.

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: Man, this really would have helped on the last big SSRS project that I worked on. If it gets resurrected I will have to keep this in mind.
item.content:encoded: Man, this really would have helped on the last big SSRS project that I worked on. If it gets resurrected I will have to keep this in mind.
